document_data.name: Camlet
document_data.mainbody: '''Camlet''' was a heavy and expensive form of fabric in the Realms, made from the hairs of [[camel]]s.
document_data.History: In [[1358 DR]], camlet was among the many fabrics that [[Hlethvagi Anteos]] kept within crates in their storeroom on the [[Dungeon Level]] of [[Undermountain]].<ref>

Notable Users.Regions & Settlements: * In the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]], camlet was among the many fabrics that one could be found used in [[Waterdeep]] for fine fabrics.
